title: nerf veigar
body: Veigar is a very overpowered champion in lol. once his fed hes op azz hell took a wholl team down. veigar needs a nerf pls help nerf veigar pls{{champion:45}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.

You'd be better off posting this in [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).
